thread.title: SEE IT: Harrison Ford’s near-plane crash caught on tape - NY Daily News
thread.title_full: SEE IT: Harrison Ford’s near-plane crash caught on tape - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: SEE IT: Harrison Ford’s near-plane crash caught on tape - NY Daily News

organizations.name: ny daily news video of harrison ford

text:
Video of Harrison Ford’s almost plane crash shows the “Indiana Jones” actor narrowly missing a passenger plane as he flew over it.
Ford, 74, missed a runway at John Wayne International Airport in Orange County, Calif., last week and flew low over a fully loaded jet carrying 110 passengers and six crew members as he landed on a taxiway.
The Federal Aviation Administration confirmed to the Daily News that it’s looking into the landing, but the investigation could take a while as the FAA deals with a backlog, according to TMZ .
Harrison Ford narrowly avoided crashing his plane last week when he landed on a taxiway instead of a runway. (Jordan Strauss/Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) A witness told the gossip site that Ford “completely misjudged the runway” and “banked really sharp” just seconds before hitting the taxiway.
Harrison Ford returns to flying three days after plane snafu 
Harrison was back behind the wheel just three days after his harrowing near-miss when he flew his Cessna 680 two-engine jet out of Santa Monica Airport, TMZ reported .
